text: Franciszek Surmiński (5 December 1934 – 2 October 2021) was a Polish racing cyclist. He was active from 1961 to 1970. He participated in road races and cyclo-cross. Surmiński was born in Tarnopol Voivodeship, Poland (present-day Ternopil Oblast, Ukraine). Surmiński died in Prudnik, Poland on 2 October 2021, aged 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish cyclists Category:People from Ternopil Oblast
title: Franciszek Surmiński
